fullplot: Seven Australian teenage friends from a small town go on a camping trip to be with nature. During their trip, they see military aircraft fly overhead. What they didn't know was their country was being invaded by another country. Returning home, they discover that they are at war. With no training, they band together to fight the enemy.
plot: When their country is invaded and their families are taken, eight unlikely high school teenagers band together to fight.
title: Tomorrow, When the War Began

tomatoes.consensus: While the script isn't amazing and the story's race issues linger, this adaptation of John Marsden's book is an exciting, action-heavy adventure that should please fans of the series.
